title: Conditionals (0â€“3)
description: Express real and imaginary situations using the first, second, third, and zero conditional.

title: Passive Voice
description: Focus on the action or object of a sentence rather than who is doing it.

title: Reported Speech
description: Say what someone else said using backshifting and reporting verbs.

title: Modals in the Past
description: Express deduction, advice or obligation in the past: must have, should have, etc.

title: Relative Clauses
description: Combine information using defining and non-defining clauses with who, which, where, etc.

title: Wish / If Only
description: Express regrets or wishes about the present, past or future.

title: Inversion for Emphasis
description: Emphasize parts of a sentence using inversion after negative adverbials like 'Never have I seen...'

title: Mixed Conditionals
description: Describe cause-effect relationships across different times: If I had studied, I would be...

title: Future Perfect
description: Talk about actions that will be completed before a certain time in the future.

title: Cleft Sentences
description: Add emphasis to what we say using 'What I love is...' or 'It was John who...'
